content.text: 6 individually wrapped caramels, unwrapped and chopped
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "6 individually wrapped caramels, unwrapped and chopped" )
( ing-2 "2 apples - peeled, cored and diced" )

content.text: 0) In a medium microwave safe bowl, place the caramels and light corn syrup.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "place"@36:41 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the caramels"@42:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "light corn syrup"@59:75 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a medium microwave safe bowl"@6:34 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Microwave on high heat approximately 30 seconds, until melted.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Microwave"@3:12 / AC
		:heat ( temp-1-0 "high heat"@16:25 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "30 seconds"@40:50 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until melted"@52:64 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Place apples in the bowl, and toss until coated with the caramel and light corn syrup mixture.
